title: running docker with plugin? failing on " --install-plugin-deps"
body:
### ⚠️ Search for existing issues first ⚠️

- [X] I have searched the existing issues, and there is no existing issue for my problem

### Which Operating System are you using?

Windows

### Which version of Auto-GPT are you using?

Latest Release

### GPT-3 or GPT-4?

GPT-3.5

### Steps to reproduce 🕹

when installing the plugins zip:

```Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "https://github.com/hdkiller/Auto-GPT-SystemInfo/archive/refs/heads/master.zip" -OutFile "./plugins/Auto-GPT-SystemInfo.zip"```

at the end we get the error:
`Error: No such option: --install-plugin-deps`

any thoughts?
thanks to all!!
RS

### Current behavior 😯

_No response_

### Expected behavior 🤔

_No response_

### Your prompt 📝

```yaml
# Paste your prompt here
```
